text.section: A "stock" insurer is as defined in KRS 304.3-010.
A "mutual" insurer is as defined in KRS 304.3-020.
A "combined stock and mutual life" insurer is as defined in KRS 304.3-025.

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 24, sec. 2, effective June 18, 1970.
